description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.Pf9uh67LQ85K52AF]{Cache Hacks (Su)}

The spymaster uses their spell cache for infiltration, hiding their tracks, and uncovering secrets.

First Slot (6th Level): @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.zxecXzHipD4MEoFc]{Comprehend Languages}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.HGg3fIQGDzUwueVa]{Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.cOz93scOEdNFObSm]{Erase}*, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.BrRuThVTv1aNfUKH]{Mental Silence}

Second Slot (12th Level): @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.QPbowQ0haEfrMCzc]{Invisibility To Technology}*, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.zeW5xSSB5YtzL0gT]{Knock}*, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.PpOhvYLlqRZgU1lA]{Manipulate Tech}*, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.VqjCAsyUdpynXWS0]{Osmose}*

Third Slot (18th Level): @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.4Z6WeMM9uJ1U0wG6]{Clairaudience/Clairvoyance}*, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.WiO5ItRch6WIoZ6h]{Duplicate Data}*, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.Et8svAkPZ7RNsJJf]{Nondetection}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.5aW793TGgd3Kd4Fe]{See Invisibility}
